introduction: SmarterFolder is a MacOS application that allows users to find photos on their local drive using AI-based descriptions. It ensures full privacy as no pictures ever leave the device.
features: Full privacy with no data leaving the device
targetPeople: MacOS users looking for an efficient way to search for photos on their local drive
